title: Checkbox
description: Box that has either status 'checked' or 'unchecked'. A checkbox is used to govern a state, action, or value that can either be on or off. The checkbox MUST always state something positive.
context: A checkbox MUST be used if a binary choice (E.g. yes or no) is asked for. You MUST NOT use two radio buttons or a drop-down list with two choices for scenario.
